bible.related devos: Ókeypis lestraráætlanir og hugleiðingar sem tengjast {reference}
bible.cta: Sæktu Biblíu app fyrir börn hér
bible.title: Sæktu Biblíu-appið hér

users.friendship success: Það tókst! Þið eruð núna vinir.
users.friendship failure: Villa kom upp við að setja upp vináttu
users.error deleting account: Sorry, there was a problem on our end. Please try again or contact support.
users.account already confirmed: Your account has already been confirmed! Sign in to continue.

bible versions.title: Bíblíuútgáfa
bible versions.audio bible meta: Hlustaðu ókeypis á netinu eða sæktu YouVersion Biblíuappið og hlustaðu á hljóðbiblíur í símanum með appinu.

marketing.plans copy: Lestraráætlanir hjálpa þér að lesa í orði Guðs daglega, stuttan texta í hvert sinn.
marketing.download app copy: Tens of millions of people are using the Bible App™ to make God's Word a part of their daily lives. Download the free app and access your bookmarks, notes, and reading plans from anywhere. Enjoy hundreds of versions, including audio, all on your mobile device.
marketing.tagline: the Bible that goes with you anywhere
marketing.verse action copy: Highlight or Bookmark your favorite verses, make Verse Images that you can share, and attach public or private Notes to Bible passages.
marketing.versions copy: Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersion’s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.
marketing.download or read: Hlaða niður núna eða lesa á netinu.
